name: America's Retribution
description: Pitted against USA's fiercest foes, you either win or America loses. Side scrolling retro shooter.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2 GHz dual-core processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: A nVidia or AMD graphics card with latest drivers Storage: 327 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
